HERO.TITLE: Get in Touch with Us
HERO.DESCRIPTION: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, our team is here to help!

ITEMS.QUESTION: What are your operating hours?
ITEMS.ANSWER: We are open Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM.

ITEMS.QUESTION: Where are you located?
ITEMS.ANSWER: Our main office is located at 123 TechAdvancer Street, Suite 456, City, Country.

ITEMS.QUESTION: How long does it take for someone to respond?
ITEMS.ANSWER: Our team strives to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.

BUSINESS_HOURS.TITLE: Business Hours
BUSINESS_HOURS.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to contact us during our operating hours:

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Information
PRIVACY.DESCRIPTION: We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Learn more about how we handle your information.
